General.Name: Hazer Group Limited
General.Description: Hazer Group Limited operates as a clean technology development company in Australia. It commercializes the Hazer Process, a low emission hydrogen and graphite production process technology. The company enables the conversion of natural gas and similar feedstocks into hydrogen and graphite. It serves the industrial hydrogen, hydrogen mobility, and synthetic graphite markets. Hazer Group Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Perth, Australia.
General.Address: 99 St Georges Terrace, Perth, WA, Australia, 6000
